price: Yaa ummata kiyya! Isheen tun gaala Rabbiiti, isiniif mallattoodha. Dachii Rabbii keessa haa nyaattuu ishee dhiisaa, Hamtuudhaan ishee hin tuqinaa. (Yoo akkas gootan) adabbiin dhihoo ta’e isin tuqa.”
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَةٗۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِيٓ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٞ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi hādhihi nāqatu al-lahi lakum āyatan fadharūhā takul fī arḍi al-lahi walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābun qarībun
